page.title: 04Weekends in Wimbish
page.content: At weekends we do not have to go to school. On Saturdays and Sundays we can go out with our family and friends. We can go swimming or skating in Saffron Walden. We can have picnics or go to sports days. Once a year we help at the School Sale. We have games in the playground on Sale days. Sometimes we can go to London or perhaps to camp. It is fun staying in tents for the weekend. We can go to visit our Nannas or Grandads, or go to barbecues. Sometimes we can stay up very late and then on Sundays we are tired! On Sundays we can go to Church or perhaps our family goes fishing. When we go we set up 3 rods. Usually I catch the most fish. Once I went strawberry picking. If it is raining we can play with the computer or watch the television. Sometimes we get bored if it rains at weekends.
